description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Windows DWM core library (CVE-2024-38150), apply the relevant security updates for your Windows version:

1. Identify your current Windows version and build number.

2. Download and install the appropriate update package from the Microsoft Update Catalog:
   - [KB5041571](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041571) for Windows 11 Version 21H2.
   - [KB5041585](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041585) for Windows 11 Versions 22H2, 23H2.
   - [KB5041580](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041580) for Windows 10 Version 21H2 and 22H2.

3. Restart your system after installation to ensure the updates take effect.

**Details**:
- This patch mitigates a use after free vulnerability that could allow an attacker to elevate privileges. 
- Ensure you are running a compatible version of Windows 10 or 11 based on the compliance list provided.
- Backup your data before proceeding with the updates to prevent data loss.
